name: Happy Jellies
description:
Controls:

Jump with Space Button

Criteria:

Credits:

KendallFire - Developer and Graphic Artist

Thrimur - Sound Designer and Developer

Audio by Pond5 and Wingless Seraph

Artwork by More Mountains

Game Description:

The jelly forest is usually filled to the brim with happy little jelly creatures but something seems off… Angry grey faced Jellies have started running amuck! Help little Jello save the Jelly Forest by collecting Happy Coins. Turn the grey faced jellies into happy jellies by jumping on top of their angry emotions!

 

Meet Jello!

Join him on his quest to make everyone happy!

Developed in Unity within 4 days for JamGoJam DNA 15!
